titles.title: REFORM Act
REFORM Act
Restoring Equity For Offenses Related to Marijuana Act
To amend the Uniform Code of Military Justice to modify the treatment of certain controlled substance violations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Restoring Equity For Offenses Related to Marijuana Act or the REFORM Act
This bill limits the maximum punishment for offenses related to the wrongful use or possession of marijuana under the Uniform Code of Military Justice (UCMJ) and includes certain offenses related to controlled substances as ones handled by Special Trial Counsel.
